remarks: A group multiple of the identity, for integer multiple.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgnn0z.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgnn0z.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgnn0z.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
mulgz $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N .x. .0. ) = .0. ) $.
